title: Rainy night city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a rainy city street at moderate speed, with no significant braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars driving in the same direction. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed because the road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars driving in the same direction.
